title: Update Pricing minimum investment range text

requirements.summary: Change the displayed "Minimum Investment" range for the selected Pricing card to exactly "$51 - $200" without altering any other pricing ranges.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Pricing section, the selected "Minimum Investment" value renders exactly as "$51 - $200" (including spacing around the hyphen).
No other text elements outside the selected XPath are modified as part of this change.

file_operations.description: Update the hardcoded "Minimum Investment" displayed text for the selected element (the conditional branch for the highlighted/second pricing card currently rendering "$201 - $1000") to instead render exactly "$51 - $200", leaving all other branches and surrounding markup unchanged to satisfy the XPath-only change constraint.
